Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika » 13.7 Sappītikaduka, Kusalattika » 13.7.2 Akusalapada
Hetu
Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
Sappītikaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Hetu
49.
2488Sappītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
2489Appītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  dve.
2490Sappītikaṃ akusalañca appītikaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
50.
2491Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha…pe…  avigate cha. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Kusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi…pe…  pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)
